mods.abstract: A Runaway in Jail. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 3d October instant, 1855, a griff-boy, calling himself JOHN, aged about 22 years, 5 feet, 4 inches high, he speaks english and french, is stout built. John says he belongs to Mr. Wm. Sprow, living near Springfield, Parish of Natchitoches, Louisiana. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, October 6th, 1855.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
